EmailTemplate.subject: NCS – Important Timetable Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS – Important Timetable Change Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
Due to unforeseen circumstances, we have had to change the outdoor centre for the first part of {!Contact.FirstName}'s NCS programme.
{!Contact.FirstName} will now be staying at Henley Fort Outdoor Education Centre in Guildford, Surrey.
The meeting point for Friday 15 July is still the same.
Please click here to see the updated timetable: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/assets/Ealing_A_Su_7__TT.pdf
If you have any questions, please do get in touch with us on the details below.
We look forward to seeing {!Contact.FirstName} on NCS!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
